item.title: Overview
item.description: Krab by default will load and parse all the configuration files at KRAB_DIR path. File names should end with .krab.hcl extension, otherwise they won’t be loaded. Every command that touches database is required to provide DATABASE_URL environment variable.

item.title: Environment variables
item.description: KRAB_DIR - directory to load configuration from, if not defined, it defaults to the current working directory DATABASE_URL - PostgreSQL connection string to use when executing actions

item.title: Resource arguments
item.description: Some resources accept arguments block that allows to parametrize command. Arguments blocks are optional and can expand configuration in a flexible ways. resource ["label" ["label"...]] { arguments { arg "one" { description = "Some argument description" } arg "two" { description = "Argument with specified type" type = "string" # default } } } arg "name" - argument name description - summary of an argument type - currently can only be a string type arguments are required to pass into command Arguments usage # Krab uses Go lang templates to replace values.
